name: Holy Matri(x)mony
description:
"Teamwork Makes The Network Work!"

Play with Arrow Keys or WASD, Retry with R

Our world is joined together by screens. LED Repair will strengthen that bond. That's where you come in.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for GMTK2021 following the theme "Joined Together".

Made by Austin and Devyn. Thanks for checking out our 4th jam!

Special Thanks:

Gavin Brooks - Game Music. Check out his work!
